Title: Tanken Driland
Description: ['Due to the influence of someone who visited her town when she was a child, Princess Mikoto of Elua decides to become a hunter and search for treasure all over the land of Driland. She sets out on her journey with her personal assistant Wallens, but they are soon joined by Pollon, a hunter who dreams of being a hero, and Paan, a wandering knight. As they continue their exploration they begin to sense great danger drawing near.']
Voices: ['Miyamoto, Kanako', 'Nojima, Kenji', 'Kumai, Motoko', 'Uchiyama, Kouki', 'Nozawa, Masako', 'Saito, Kimiko']
Staff: [['Bogdan, Gyarmath', 'Producer'], ['Gree', 'Producer, Original Creator'], ['Ikeda, Youko', 'Episode Director, Storyboard'], ['Kamata, Chie', 'Script']]
